title: Characteristics of the northern spotted owl

content.prompt:
Correct statements about the northern spotted owl include which of the following?

  1. It is a pioneer species that is an opportunistic feeder.

  2. It is dependent on mature, old-growth forest for its habitat.

  3. It is a carnivore at or near the top of the food chain.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
